title: The Fighting Marines (1936) Old Time Serial (OTS)
description:
From 1935 comes 12 episodes of The Fighting Marines in glorious Black and White.

Plot:  When the United States Marine Corps starts building a landing strip on
       Halfway Island in the Pacific, they interfere with the secret hideout of
       a mad scientific wizard, The Tiger Shark, who wages a campaign to
       sabotage their efforts.

--or--

Corporal Larry Grant and Sergeant "Mac" McGowan, of the United States Marine Corps, are rival for the love of Frances Schiller, but team up to hunt down "The Tiger Shark," a mad, scientific wizard who is holding Sergeant William Schiller, Frances' brother, a prisoner on a wild, jungle island in the Pacific.
- Written by Les Adams <  >

--or--

U.S. Marines, attempting to build a landing field on Halfway Island in the Pacific, unwittingly endanger the secret hideout of a mysterious figure known as The Tiger Shark. The Tiger Shark therefore begins a program of sabotage and murder against the Marines.
- Written by Jim Beaver <  > 


Chapter  1 - Human Targets              
Chapter  2 - Isle of Missing Men        
Chapter  3 - The Savage Hoard           
Chapter  4 - The Mark of the Tiger Shark
Chapter  5 - The Gauntlet of Grief      
Chapter  6 - Robber's Roost             
Chapter  7 - Jungle Terrors             
Chapter  8 - Siege of Halfway Island    
Chapter  9 - Death from the Sky         
Chapter 10 - Wheels of Destruction      
Chapter 11 - Behind the Mask            
Chapter 12 - Two Against the Horde
